The City Council meets the 2nd and 4th Tuesday of each month at 6:30pm.

The Mayor and five Council Members serve for two-year terms.

ROCKWALL COUNTY BURN BAN STATUS

MEMORIAL BRICK CAMPAIGN

Honor a veteran (living or deceased) with a commemorative brick to be placed at the McLendon-Chisholm Veteran’s Memorial. Only $30 per brick.
